FuncDef: This command enters the context to configure a primary (no option specified) or secondary (secondaryoption specified) action to be performed on packets matching this filter entry. An ACL filter entry remains inactive (is not programmed in hardware) until a specific action is configured for that entry.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a secondary action to be performed on packets matching this filter entry. A secondary action can only be configured if a primary action is configured.
